messages.title: Corbyn's Latest Tax on Every Home in Barking & Dagenham
messages.content: Tax on homes 'to treble under Labour plans for Land Value Tax'.

messages.title: Digging Deeper
messages.content: Labour planning new 'Garden Tax' which could see council tax treble.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour planning new 'Garden Tax' and 'Land Value Tax', which could potentially triple council tax.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Seats like yours will decide. A loss of just six seats and Theresa May's government loses its majority.
